statements: SELECT * FROM prescription_records ORDER BY date_prescribed DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = '123456'
SELECT prescribing_physician, date_prescribed FROM prescription_records WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin'
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, prescribing_physician FROM prescription_records WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE prescribing_physician = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_records WHERE prescribing_physician = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY date_prescribed DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, date_prescribed FROM prescription_records WHERE dosage > 50 AND prescribing_physician IN ('Dr. Johnson', 'Dr. Lee') ORDER BY date_prescribed ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, prescribing_physician FROM prescription_records WHERE medication_name LIKE '%pain%' AND dosage BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT prescribing_physician, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM prescription_records GROUP BY prescribing_physician HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY num_prescriptions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, address FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescribed_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescribed_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY prescribed_date ASC
SELECT Patients.name, Patients.address, Prescriptions.medication_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id WHERE Prescriptions.dosage = '10mg'

SELECT Patients.name, Prescriptions.medication_name, Prescriptions.prescribed_date FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id WHERE Patients.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY Prescriptions.prescribed_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, prescription_date FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM medication_history ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_history WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY prescription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 456 AND prescription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM medication_history WHERE patient_id = 789 AND dosage LIKE '%mg';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions FROM patient_prescriptions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_prescriptions > 5 ORDER BY total_prescriptions DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_schedule WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_details WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT consultation_date, doctor_name, consultation_notes FROM consultation_history WHERE patient_id = 201 ORDER BY consultation_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_details;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patient_details WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, schedule_time FROM medication_schedule WHERE dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT prescription_date, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_records WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%' ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;

SELECT patient_id, consultation_date, doctor_name, consultation_notes FROM consultation_history WHERE consultation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY patient_id, consultation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records pr JOIN patient_details pd ON pr.patient_id = pd.patient_id WHERE pr.dosage > 100 ORDER BY pr.prescription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, contact_number FROM patients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name='Aspirin';
SELECT full_name, DATE_PART('year', age(date_of_birth)) AS age FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND frequency = 'Twice daily';
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE patients.full_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY prescriptions.prescription_date ASC;

SELECT consultations.consultation_date, doctors.full_name, patients.full_name, notes FROM consultations INNER JOIN doctors ON consultations.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id INNER JOIN patients ON consultations.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE notes LIKE '%follow-up%';
SELECT medication_name, start_date, end_date FROM medication_history WHERE reason = 'Allergy' ORDER BY start_date DESC, medication_name;
